    News

    Reading sack Brian McDermott

    Reading have sacked Brian McDermott following a dismal run that has left the club joint-bottom of the league.

    Di Canio favourite for Reading job

    Sky Bet have installed Paolo Di Canio as their even-money favourite to be the next Reading manager.

    Ribery misses Arsenal return

    Franck Ribery has been ruled out of the second leg of Bayern Munich's Champions League tie with Arsenal.

    Roberts sad to see boss leave

    Reading striker Jason Roberts admitted he was sad to hear of Brian McDermott's sacking as manager.

    Giroud: Gunners can't make mistakes

    Olivier Giroud hopes Arsenal can be mistake-free against Bayern Munich in Wednesday's Champions League clash.

    Mulgrew wants Rangers back

    Celtic defender Charlie Mulgrew admits he would ideally like Rangers to be back in the SPL next season.

    Posh and Blades the picks

    Our Nick Hext makes Peterborough and Sheffield United his two picks from the midweek Football League action.

    Benitez: Fergie snubbed handshake

    Rafael Benitez accused Sir Alex Ferguson of snubbing his attempt to shake hands before Chelsea's 2-2 draw with Man Utd.

    Ferdinand may face FA censure

    Rio Ferdinand may face FA action after an altercation with Chelsea's Fernando Torres during Sunday's 2-2 draw.

    FA wait to make replay decision

    The FA is not expected to make a decision on the FA Cup replay between Man Utd and Chelsea until later this week.
